name: HyperCold
description:
HyperCold

SuperHot, but shrinked to two dimensions ! Solve puzzles in a top down shooter where you control how time flows. Time slows down when you're stopped and accelerates when you act !

Controls:
WASD: move you character
Click: Shoot/Close combat

Submission for Mix and Jam 2019
Theme: Dimension Change

Some particle effects and shader made from my submission to Ludum Dare 45
